channel.title: Trillopolis - Where the players make a difference | Looking for Staff |
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.trillopolis.com/images/logo2.png[/img][/CENTER] Need Staff + Looking for Staff
Forums: [url=http://www.trillopolis.com/forums/index.php]Trillopolis[/url] Webclient [url=http://www.trillopolis.com/playnow.php]Trillopolis - Play Now[/url] Downloadable: [URL=http://"http://www.trillopolis.com/Trillopolisv1.5.jar"]http://www.trillopolis.com/Trillopolisv1.5.jar[/URL] Mirror 1: [url=http://up.ht/15f8his"]http://up.ht/15f8his]Uppit[/url]
Virus Scan: http://gyazo.com/0437f321f39190b4b11968822c78d971
[SIZE=12px][COLOR=red]Features:[/COLOR][/SIZE] 24/7 Forums Decanting Player Profiles Vote Shop Highscores Quests - A New Beginning - The Harmless Island - Gaining Salvation Minigames - Colosseum - Zombie Survival - Barbarian Assault - Pest Control - Fight Pits - Fight Caves All Skills Working w/ 100% Slayer Starter Class Prestiging Economy Based (No rare items are in shops, each boss has it's own rare.)
